name: Claus Brabrand
content: Claus Brabrand ((( CLAUS BRABRAND ))) Claus Brabrand, Ph.D. Full Professor Head of Center for Computing Education Research (CCER) Department of Computer Science IT University of Copenhagen ((( CV | LinkedIn | Google Scholar | DBLP | IMDb | VBDb ))) SHORT-FILM Writer, director, producer, and co-editor of the 19-minute award-winning short-film on University teaching: ((( "Teaching Teaching & Understanding Understanding" ))) "Teaching Teaching & Understanding Understanding" is a 20-minute award-winning short-film about teaching at university and higher-level educational institutions. It is based on the Theory of Constructive Alignment and The SOLO Taxonomy developed by Professor John Biggs. The film provides a foundation for understanding what a teacher needs to do in order to make sure all types of students actually learn what the teacher intends.
